about_the_game:
Show your support for Dungeon Defenders II by purchasing this pack and gaining our eternal love and admiration.*

*Actual love and admiration not included with this pack.

This pack may only be purchased once per account. To redeem the items contained in the pack, visit and interact with the Mailbox in the Heroes Marketplace or Private Tavern.

This pack contains:

13,000 Gems to purchase Heroes, Flair, Costumes and more. (3,000 Extra Gems!)

10 Mythical Defender Packs to gain any number of cosmetic rewards to look your best!

3 of Each Campaign through Chaos VI Shard Packs to equip unique bonuses to your heroes and defenses.

“Titan” Title to show Etheria your prowess.

Legendary Katkarot Pet to achieve ultimate levels of power!

name: Dungeon Defenders II - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1)
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2600 or better / NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or better, 512 MB video memory, with Shader Model 3 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1) / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Quad-Core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or AMD Radeon HD 4770 or better (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play. Integrated graphics chips are not recommended.

short_description: Show your support for Dungeon Defenders II by purchasing this pack and gaining our eternal love and admiration.* *Actual love and admiration not included with this pack.
